entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
